document_data.name: Protection
document_data.Effects: This spell was used to protect an individual against attack. The number of individuals that could be protected at a single casting was determined by the caster's skill level. This spell offered no protection against weapons made from metal.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]: the shell from a snapping turtle.
